lead_paragraph: A sewage system worker's corpse is found beneath a manhole in Mumbai. An old storyteller is accused and indicted for abetment of suicide. As the trial unfolds, the private lives of the people involved in the case are examined.
snippet: A sewage system worker's corpse is found beneath a manhole in Mumbai. An old storyteller is accused and indicted for abetment of suicide. As the trial unfolds, the private lives of the people involved in the case are examined.
